entities.name: the riddle house
entities.description: The location where the story takes place.

entities.name: frank
entities.description: The protagonist of the story who is trying to escape from a snake.

entities.name: the snake
entities.description: A snake that is chasing Frank and making hissing noises.

entities.name: the cold voice
entities.description: A mysterious voice beyond the door that is making hissing noises.

relationships.description: Frank is related to the cold voice, possibly as a victim or witness.
The snake is following the hissing noises made by the cold voice.
